attributes.title: Strange Sounds?
attributes.review: After downloading this app, my phone began randomly playing the Russian national anthem. I didn’t even know they had one until I looked it up!! As soon as I deleted Trump’s app, the music stopped.

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: Not only did it release a high pitch noise which made my dog bark but it glitched my phone and turned it off. I would NOT recommend this app for anyone who wants a working phone.

attributes.title: 🌚 what is the cat in garfield🌝
attributes.review: i downloaded the app in hopes of getting unbiased and accurate news — however , when i opened the app, it was a shopping center ? it looked as if they exclusively sold oranges ? i dunno … was not what i was expecting. i was shocked to find all the racist , homophobic , and sexist news and prayed for the poor souls who followed it 💔. but on the bright side : i never knew oranges took nudes! the more you know, am i right 😹

attributes.title: Dump Trump
attributes.review: This app is terrible. There are many reasons as to why this app should be removed. But mostly because of the racist, homophobic, idiot that represents this app. The app kept crashing and I got so many notifications!!  TAKE IT OFF!!!

attributes.title: Hacks all your information
attributes.review: Had this app for 1 hour and i can back into my phone to see all my photos, itunes songs, instagram, snapchat, and other apps wiped out of my phone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.title: Absolutely trash
attributes.review: This app is so terrible The Quality is so terrible and I can’t stand how it looks it makes me nauseous and it makes my room look orange cause well you know why overall worst app ever 😌🤮

attributes.title: GEN-Z
attributes.review: I simple don’t have much to say because this sucksss🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️ This all is no help and requires too many steps to begin with I will even support this orange🔫🔫 WE ARE TAKING OVER. Anyways I hope this app gets taken down lol have a nice day!!🦋🦋

attributes.title: Stupid
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and then my phone started getting hacked. Pretty sure trump is trying to steal all of my information. Terrible app. -10/10 would recommend

attributes.title: Very dissatisfied
attributes.review: This app is very disappointing. Was trying to show my grandma some educational issues that have been going on but halfway thru scrolling I was bombarded with videos and pictures of anime tiddies

attributes.title: Gen Z😌💫
attributes.review: This app is genuinely bad, it makes my phone glitch, it tried to make my phone do things it usually doesn’t do, this app is slow and doesn’t work right
